context: Mid-sized insurance company exploring parametric insurance products for faster claims settlement in weather-related events

request.purpose: Develop parametric insurance products using satellite data and weather APIs for automated claims
request.justification: Traditional claims processes take 30-60 days; parametric products can settle in hours for qualifying events

decision_process.outcome: Feasible for crop and weather-related insurance lines

business_impact.expected_outcome: New revenue stream from parametric products, improved customer satisfaction through fast claims

lessons_learned: Parametric products require careful parameter selection to balance customer value with company risk. Early regulatory engagement is crucial for innovative insurance products. Pilot programs should include diverse customer segments to test market acceptance. Clear communication about how parametric products differ from traditional insurance is essential for customer understanding.
